mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Mapping ( DatabaseFrom, DatabaseTo, TableFrom, TableTo, ColumnFrom, ColumnTo ) VALUES ( #{databaseFrom}, #{databaseTo}, #{tableFrom}, #{tableTo}, #{columnFrom}, #{columnTo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Mapping SET DatabaseFrom = #{databaseFrom}, DatabaseTo = #{databaseTo}, TableFrom = #{tableFrom}, TableTo = #{tableTo}, ColumnFrom = #{columnFrom}, ColumnTo = #{columnTo} WHERE id = #{id}
